name: The Conveni 2
description:
PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

To download content to the Memory Stick PRO Duo™ of your PSP® (PlayStation®Portable) system, the free space required is twice the size of the content to be downloaded.

This software is playable for PLAYSTATION®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).

To download this software, you must also have at least 30MB of free space on your PLAYSTATION®3 system's hard disk.
To play this software with your PSP®, the latest system software and a Memory Stick Duo™ with at least 30MB of free space are required.
For more detail information about download to your PSP® system, please see below URL.

http://asia.playstation.com

When downloading using PC:
When downloading contents to PSP®, you must install the PLAYSTATION®Network Downloader application first. Please go to our official website for installing instructions and other information.

??

?Game description
In this latest The CONVENI 2, you run convenience stores as you try to expand your chain nationwide. As the owner, try to boost sales and increase your number of stores to achieve the goals on each map. The game's graphics have been completely retooled and more maps have been added! A high-speed mode has also been added! Even playability has been improved! This is a complete convenience simulation in which you can send spies to rival stores to collect information and even buy out your competitors! Go for it! Expand till you are a nationwide chain!

?PS3™ HDD and Memory Stick™ capacity requirement
30MB
